name: The Arbor Bar
description:
Welcome to the Arbor Bar!

You are a woodland critter that recently got a job as a bartender. You'll be meeting a kind old turtle who goes by the name Buck. And he needs your help with getting the Arbor Bar back on its feet and be the coziest spot in the forest. 

Concoct yummy beverages and be the life of the bar by helping patrons enjoy the autumn atmosphere! 

So pull up a chair and drink in the sights! 

Hulkmeistercoder#0598, AI Programming and Animation

whatswithandy#4469, Gameplay and AI Programming

Johannes Wetterbro aka KassBot#8742, Music and Sound

Julia Nguyen aka njillus#3801, 2D Concept Art and UI

Marx#2062, Writing, Level Decoration/Concept and VO

StormTruck#7064, Designer and 3D artist

Carrie Lee aka SadSadKiddie, Character and 3D Artist
